memberdef.name: ADD_ATTR
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if (attributeIndex >= attributeSize) { \ attributeSize *= 2; \ pixelAttributes = (NSOpenGLPixelFormatAttribute *)NSZoneRealloc(NULL, pixelAttributes, sizeof(*pixelAttributes) * attributeSize); \ } \ pixelAttributes[attributeIndex] = (NSOpenGLPixelFormatAttribute)x; \ attributeIndex++; \ if ( verbose ) { \ common->Printf( "Adding pixel attribute: %d (%s)\n", x, #x); \ } \ } while(0)
